comments:
I20070807-0010

I started my development workspace and opened a few files I've checked out from CVS. My QuickDiff provider is the CVS provider. Somehow, I lost my network connection to dev.eclipse.org, so the QuickDiff requests started to time out (but I didn't realize that). When I missed the QuickDiff information in an editor, I chose Compare With > Latest from HEAD. This opened a dialog "Progress Information" with msg "Processing <path-to-file>" and "Connecting via SSH to dev.eclipse.org".

After a few seconds, I clicked Cancel, which disabled the Cancel button but did not cancel the operation. I had to wait for several minutes until the progress dialog finally disappeared. During this time, I got a new log entry like this about every minute:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.cvs.core 4 -29 2007-08-08 11:03:55.656
!MESSAGE Could not connect to :extssh:mkeller@dev.eclipse.org:/cvsroot/eclipse: CVS communication error: org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2Se
rverConnection$SSH2IOException: A timeout occurred connecting to host dev.eclipse.org
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection$SSH2IOException: A timeout occurred connecting to host dev.eclipse.org
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection.internalOpen(CVSSSH2ServerConnection.java:193)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection.open(CVSSSH2ServerConnection.java:107)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.Connection.open(Connection.java:132)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.createConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:547)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.connection.CVSRepositoryLocation.openConnection(CVSRepositoryLocation.java:791)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Session.open(Session.java:159)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFile.internalFetchContents(RemoteFile.java:215)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFile.fetchContents(RemoteFile.java:193)
        at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.CachedResourceVariant.ensureContentsCached(CachedResourceVariant.java:111)
        at org.eclipse.team.core.variants.CachedResourceVariant.getStorage(CachedResourceVariant.java:101)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.RemoteFile.getContents(RemoteFile.java:184)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.readDocument(RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.java:254)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.getReference(RemoteRevisionQuickDiffProvider.java:131)
        at org.eclipse.ui.internal.texteditor.quickdiff.DocumentLineDiffer$2.run(DocumentLineDiffer.java:496)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Caused by: com.jcraft.jsch.JSchException: Session.connect: java.io.InterruptedIOException: A timeout occurred connecting to host dev.eclipse.org
        at com.jcraft.jsch.Session.connect(Session.java:494)
        at com.jcraft.jsch.Session.connect(Session.java:145)
        at org.eclipse.jsch.internal.core.JSchProvider.connect(JSchProvider.java:52)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.JSchSession.createSession(JSchSession.java:361)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.JSchSession.getSession(JSchSession.java:326)
        at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ssh2.CVSSSH2ServerConnection.internalOpen(CVSSSH2ServerConnection.java:122)
        ... 14 more


-------------------------------------------------

It looks like the user initiated connection is blocked on the QuickDiff connection which is not canceled. We should be able to use a non-blocking acquire on the repository location lock and check the progress monitor for cancellation.

Michael, could you give me some details about this fix (what classes did you change ?). There is no patch, so i need some information to verify this fix. At the same time I can't reproduce bug form original comment, so I would appreciate any tips in this matter too.
The fix is in CVSRepositoryLocation. When acquiring the host lock, we use acquire(int) instead of acquire().

Verified in I20070919-0010.

To reproduce,
- set quick diff provider to CVS
- check out a CVS project
- in CVS Repositories view, change the host to download.eclipse.org (which does not run a cvs server and will therefore time out)
- open a few files
- make a change, save
- Replace With > Latest from HEAD, click OK to replace
- click Cancel
=> in 3.4M1, cancelling took a while, while in I20070919-0010, it happens promptly.

traces.message: A timeout occurred connecting to host dev.eclipse.org

causedBy.message: A timeout occurred connecting to host dev.eclipse.org
